questions.question:
Which of the following is a type of cloud service model?
(a) SaaS
(b) PaaS
(c) IaaS
(d) All of the above
Cloud computing allows users to access resources remotely over the internet. True or False
The process of scaling resources up or down based on demand is called _____
Explain the difference between public and private cloud.
questions.correct_answer: A public cloud is hosted and managed by a third-party provider, accessible over the internet, while a private cloud is dedicated to a single organization for more control and security.
